page.title: 10Industry
page.content: As would be expected, farming, chiefly arable is the main industry in this sparcely populated rural community. Various crops are grown including cereals, rape, potatoes and other vegetables and of couse the breeding of livestock. However there are several small businesses in this area which are closely connected to agriculture. In Dunham on Trent and Ragnall there is an Agricultural and 'Do it Yourself' supplier, two agricultural merchants, a metalworker and a builder and in Newton on Trent, which is the larger village there is a potato merchant, a road haulier,a timber merchant, a farm implement manufacturer,and agricultural engineer and a tractor/car mechanic who operates from premises once used by the village blacksmith.
